title: Introducing: Elysse
content:
Brooklyn’s Elysse shines on her silky smooth debut single, Eve – merging her downright luxurious vocal with some exquisitely plush production.

Songwriting wise, there’s almost a 60’s crooner edge to it – in truth, if you stripped away the production, I could imagine this being played on a grand piano in an uber-trendy NY dive bar (if those still exist?!). Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
